translated: They are neither profitable nor unprofitable. They are indeterminate. For they are not opposed in characteristic to profitable and unprofitable states as are the unprofitable and profitable. For non-resultantness is not opposed to resultantness as is profitable to unprofitable, nor is profitable resultantness opposed to unprofitable resultantness as is unprofitable to profitable. So they are not abandoned by either of the two kinds of path. And they are not to be abandoned by anything, since they are not subject to defilement. This is the opinion here. They have the characteristic of being blameless and having pleasant result. Herein, they are blameless since there is no blame in them. They are free from blame, is the meaning. So he shows that they are not to be blamed. He does not show that they are merely free from blame. For there are other indeterminate states that are free from blame. So seeing the danger in their being reckoned as profitable because of the mere fact that they are blameless, he says â€œhaving pleasant resultâ€ in order to avoid that. Or alternatively, what is opposed to blame is here called â€œblamelessâ€ .
